move-comics.title: Organize Library

label.delete-physical-files: Delete physical files (WARNING: be sure to backup your library first)
label.target-directory: The new parent directory for the library
label.renaming-rule: The file renaming rule (see notes below)

move-comics.warning-text: Organizing your library cannot be stopped once started.
move-comics.variables-note: The following list shows the variables that can used in the renaming rules.
move-comics.variables-example-note: This example organizes a library by publisher, series, volume and then a detailed filename. Note you do NOT need to specify the extension: that is added automatically.

variable.PUBLISHER: The name of the publisher of the comic
variable.SERIES: The name of the series of the comic
variable.VOLUME: The first year this volume of the comic was published
variable.ISSUE: The issue number for this isue

move-comics.delete-files-warning-message: Deleting physical files cannot be undone. Are you SURE you want to do this?
move-comics.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to {deletePhysicalFiles, select, true{delete comic files marked for deletion and} other{}} organizing the library?

rescan.paragraph1: Utilisez ce bouton pour forcer le rescan de toute votre bibliothèque.
rescan.paragraph2: Le serveur réévaluera chacune des bandes dessinées de votre bibliothèque, en mettant à jour ce qu'il sait sur chaque fichier.
rescan.paragraph3: NOTE: Pendant que la bibliothèque est en cours de scan, vous ne pourrez pas importer de nouvelles bandes dessinées.
rescan.already-running: Un scan est en cours d'exécution sur le serveur...

backup.paragraph1: Utilisez cette section pour télécharger et restaurer des instantanés de la base de données de votre bibliothèque.
backup.paragraph2: Pour télécharger le contenu actuel de la base de données, cliquez sur le bouton Exporter la bibliothèque.
